page.title: 09USES OF HIGHWORTH REC.CENTRE
page.content: There are twenty different uses besides the swimming pool in the Recreation Centre,including Keep Fit,the Community Church and various clinics.Ninety per cent of help in the Centre is voluntary.A roof will be put on the swimming pool within three years of 1985.This means the pool can be open all year but may spoil sun bathing facilities.The squash courts will be opened on the 22nd of June 1985.Then the Recreation Centre can be called an indoor sports centre.All of the money that they get they put back into the Recreation Centre and continually improve the facilities.
